step.cmd:
Select your Student Homepage
Select the ‘Personal Information’ tile
From the left-hand navigation menu, select ‘Addresses’
Under the appropriate header, e.g. ‘Diploma Address,’ if no address is defined, select the ‘Add Diploma Address’ button
You can either select the ‘Copy From’ button to copy the address from address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields
Select the green ‘Save’ button
